doc.after: As the United States is a highly diverse nation it should not be surprising that there is no single prevalent household arrangement While the nuclear family consisting of a married couple with their own children is often seen as the average American family such households constitute less than a quarter of all households 4 1 Married couples without children are currently the plurality constituting 28 7 of households compared to 24 1 for nuclear families
